knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```{r setup, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(raster)
library(NEFSCspatial)
```

The spatial data bundled in this package are either in `raster` or `sf` format. For the shapefiles in `sf` format, you can view the fields simply by typing the name of the data set

```{r data_sf}
NEFSCspatial::Shellfish_Strata
```

Similarly, you can view the details of a `raster` data set by typing its name into the R Console

```{r data_raster}
NEFSCspatial::amapps_grid
```

To visualize the data simply use the plot function

```{r plot_sf}
plot(NEFSCspatial::Shellfish_Strata)
```
```{r plot_raster}
plot(NEFSCspatial::amapps_grid)
```
